Text: The full X-plane version is about 7 DVDs... it might be faster to buy it rather than DLing...
Don't waste your time this does not work any way

Hi people, first comment here and... And yes, waste your time installing this fake DVD to enjoy X-plane, it's easy, easy:

1) Just download demo version 8.64 (that's a full version too) and install it. 
2) Then launch dmg before X-plane, mantaining it opened, X-plane will recognize it as legal DVD. 

That's all folks.
